alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 6:12PM EDT until August 12 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Okaloosa County in northwestern Florida... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 511 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles south of Crestview, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wright, Fort Walton Beach, Niceville, Destin, Eglin AFB, Valparaiso, Ocean City, Lake Lorraine, Shalimar, and Cinco Bayou. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
